report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory ICS: Johnson Controls Metasys Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory ICS: Johnson Controls Metasys Vulnerability
text: Johnson Controls Metasys could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an unspecified flaw. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to lock other users out of the system and take over accounts.
